mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Bushrod Washington to Geo[rge] C[orbin] Washington, 1825 December 24
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Washington, Bushrod, 1762-1829
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Bushrod Washington responds that he is glad to have him (George Corbin Washington) and Mr. Hughes to visit Mt. Vernon. Name on original manuscript appears as "Bush Washington". Directed "By Harry" [pasted in back of G.W.'s diary for year 1797]. Autograph letter signed, 1p.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Washington, George Corbin, 1789-1854
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: George Washington Collection ; see related material - http://catalog.mountvernon.org/cdm/singleitem/collection/p16829coll22/id/111/rec/1
